name: Mission: Decarbonize Port City
summary: Mobilize foresight, research, optimization, and knowledge hubs to drive a whole-of-city clean transition.

steps.description: Systemic foresight scanning of maritime emissions and policy levers.
Open research sprint to identify technology portfolios and financing models.
Optimization blueprint for retrofitting vessels and grid integrations.
Policy knowledge graph and diplomacy playbook for adoption.

name: Mission: Pandemic Watch
summary: Global sentinel network aligning public foresight, research, and operational readiness.

steps.description: Foresight sweep for anomalous epidemiological signals across data feeds.
Collective intelligence research on emerging variants and countermeasures.
Logistics optimization for PPE, vaccines, and field hospitals.
Knowledge synthesis and public advisory modules for civic leaders.
